titleStmt.title: The Dying speeches, letters and prayers &c. of those eminent Protestants who suffered in the west of England (and elsewhere) under the cruel sentence of the late Lord Chancellour, then Lord Chief Justice Jefferys : with an account of their undaunted courage at the barr, and afterwards : with the most remarkable circumstances that attended their execution : never before published.

The Dying speeches, letters and prayers &c. of those eminent Protestants who suffered in the west of England (and elsewhere) under the cruel sentence of the late Lord Chancellour, then Lord Chief Justice Jefferys : with an account of their undaunted courage at the barr, and afterwards : with the most remarkable circumstances that attended their execution : never before published.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Dunton ... to be sold by R. Janeway ...

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained, with loss of print.
Error in paging: p. 21-24 lacking in number only.
This item appears at reel 1033:27 as Wing D2956 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 2242:19 as Wing (2nd ed.) T3372A.
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the British Library.
